attributes.action: call on Middlesbrough Borough Council to stop all plans to bulldoze Site 44, Longridge Wood and preserve this land for the residents of South Middlesbrough to enjoy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a small family woodland which is greatly used by the residents of South Middlesbrough.  We have been fighting to save this woodland for four years, but Middlesbrough Council are intent on building 70 houses  There is no developer involved at the present time and the council intend to bulldoze the trees to make a hay meadow.  Please sign the petition and help us keep our trees which are so vital to climate change.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "call on Middlesbrough Borough Council to stop all plans to bulldoze Site 44, Longridge Wood and preserve this land for the residents of South Middlesbrough to enjoy."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21008


Prime Minister's Office
